header.title: Documenting the Skolt Sámi lexicon file

section.title: Documenting the Skolt Sámi lexicon file
Introduction
section.p: The smj-lex.txt file contains the basic declension for even-, odd- and contracted nouns, has two derivational processes, and the main patterns of the adjective declension. As for the verbs, it covers the auxiliaries, and some of the main verbs.
